content: I like the app design, it's very nice but I would like to see more features like courses or events in each work space, it will be amazing to compare between many work space's courses with details about pricing, instructor and some information about the course.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your feedback, we have passed it through to our growth team and will ensure to keep you posted once this is live.

content: Dont like that i have to enter in my credit card details to book a space. Make it so that I need to do it when the booking is accepted. Nobody is going to trust a rather unknown app with their payment details.
replyContent:
Hi Bill

Thank you for your feedback. Our payment provider is stripe, so rest assured your details are secure. We also put hold on the booking value when you request a booking but we do not actually capture till booking is confirmed and cancellation period is over.

Let us know if you need any details from our end.

content: Shi**y app. Booked an office a week ahead of time, was informed that someone would call me to follow up and tell me next steps. A week later, no calls, no emails, nothing!! The booking was supposed to be for today, but here I am, nobody called, no follow up emails.... Nothing!! Waste of time! 100% unrecommended!!
replyContent: We are very sorry for the inconvenience. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at help@hotdesk.io.

content: Very good app to find nearby co working spaces but I have an "issue" with back button when i select the space on the map and try to go back it exit from the app other than that it is amazing
Not recommend at all to download. A lot of bugs and difficulties will face you during your signing. Also, you will be able to sign up or sign in.
replyContent: We are sorry if you have faced issues with the app. Please email us at help@hotdesk.io and we will be happy to assist or report a bug using this form https://forms.gle/KxBH3nqfvoQ23r1T8
